variables.name: domainName
variables.helpText: Provide your company domain name. If the SSO URL is https://f5.achievers.com, enter f5

validator.message: Allowed characters are (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscore ( _ ), period ( . ), or hyphen ( - ).

variables.name: entityId
variables.helpText: Provide Adobe's EntityID URL from the metadata file or Adobe Administrator.

variables.name: hostname
variables.helpText: Provide the hostname configured in Adobe Sign. You can obtain this from the ACS URL. For eg - If ACS URL is https://company.na1.echosign.com/public/samlConsume then the hostname is company.

validator.message: Allowed characters are (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscore ( _ ), period ( . ), or hyphen ( - ).

variables.name: personImmutableID
variables.helpText: Provide the session variable which will map to the personimmutableID attribute. This attribute is sent to ADP in the assertion.

variables.helpText: Provide the sub domain. For eg - If the SSO URL is https://company.datatap.adverity.com/complete/saml/, then the sub domain is company.

variables.name: companyId
variables.helpText: Provide the company ID from the relay state. For eg, if the relay state is https://company.datatap.adverity.com/login/saml/?idp=abcd, then the company id is abcd.

variables.name: accountID
variables.helpText: Provide the account ID from the callback URL. For eg, if the callback URL is https://idmanager.aerohive.com/idmanager/register/saml/callback/123456, then the account id is 123456

validator.message: Allowed characters are (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscore ( _ ), period ( . ), or hyphen ( - ).

variables.helpText: Provide the Sub Domain. For eg if the SSO URL is https://company.login.go.akamai-access.com/saml/sp/response, the Sub Domain is company.

validator.message: Allowed characters are (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscore ( _ ), period ( . ), or hyphen ( - ).
